_header: I knowledge to God with very contrition
Subjects: confession; prayers, for use in church
_description: A general Confession — eleven stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawB408.First Lines:
I knowlech to god with veray contricounVn to seynt mary and his
                    seyntis alle…
BodRawB408.Last Lines:
…With such vnderstondyng and clere wisdomeThat y may come to
                    þi kyngdome
